definition: sensing an odor by inhaling through the nose, inhale audibly through the nose
details:
noun
- sensing an odor by inhaling through the nose
= synonyms: snuff
verb
- inhale audibly through the nose
= example: inhale audibly through the nose
= synonyms: sniffle
- perceive by inhaling through the nose
= example: perceive by inhaling through the nose
= synonyms: whiff
